H0.text: In which Indian city is Eden Gardens, the second largest test cricket ground in the world. Kolkata

H1.text: In which Indian city is Eden Gardens, the second largest test cricket ground in the world. Delhi

H2.text: In which Indian city is Eden Gardens, the second largest test cricket ground in the world. Chennai

H3.text: In which Indian city is Eden Gardens, the second largest test cricket ground in the world. Bumbai

A4.text: Eden Gardens is an international cricket stadium in Kolkata, India.

A5.text: It is operated by Cricket Association of Bengal and is the home ground of the Kolkata Knight Riders.
